summary: Command‑line script that evaluates pretrained Duplex Text Normalization models (tagger, decoder, or a combined tagger‑decoder pipeline) on a test dataset, supporting multiple languages and configurable options such as batch size, caching, and error‑log generation.
business_intent: Provide a convenient way to measure and validate the accuracy of trained text‑normalization components used in speech and language applications, facilitating model selection, performance monitoring, and error analysis.
